title: Wall Houses
description: five house-shaped pieces of wood; each house decorated in a different manner:  black on bottom and short sides with incised long linear black marks; black on bottom and short sides with incised black tick marks in groups of five overall; unfinished on short sides with blackened holes drilled overall on remaining sides and top; black overall with incised carved radiating swirls; black on bottom and short sides with vertical chop marks heightened with black
creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
